# powerplatform_copilot_studio_application_insights (Resource)

Manages the [Application Insights configuration for a Copilot](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-copilot-studio/advanced-bot-framework-composer-capture-telemetry?tabs=webApp).

**Note:** This resource is available as **preview**

**Known Limitation**: This resource currently does not work when authenticated using service principal.

## API Endpoints

| Terraform Operation | HTTP Method | API Endpoint URL (Public Cloud)                                                                                                             |
| ------------------- | ----------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Create              | `PUT`       | `https://<power_virtual_agents_runtime_endpoint>/api/botmanagement/2022-01-15/environments/{environment_id}/bots/{bot_id}/applicationinsightsconfiguration` |
| Read                | `GET`       | `https://<power_virtual_agents_runtime_endpoint>/api/botmanagement/2022-01-15/environments/{environment_id}/bots/{bot_id}/applicationinsightsconfiguration` |
| Update              | `PUT`       | `https://<power_virtual_agents_runtime_endpoint>/api/botmanagement/2022-01-15/environments/{environment_id}/bots/{bot_id}/applicationinsightsconfiguration` |
| Delete              | `PUT`       | `https://<power_virtual_agents_runtime_endpoint>/api/botmanagement/2022-01-15/environments/{environment_id}/bots/{bot_id}/applicationinsightsconfiguration` |

## Attribute Mapping

| Resource Attribute                         | API Response JSON Field             |
| ------------------------------------------ | ----------------------------------- |
| `id`                                       | `environmentId` + `_` + `botId`     |
| `environment_id`                           | `environmentId`                     |
| `bot_id`                                   | `botId`                             |
| `application_insights_connection_string`   | `appInsightsConnectionString`       |
| `include_sensitive_information`            | `includeSensitiveInformation`       |
| `include_activities`                       | `includeActivities`                 |
| `include_actions`                          | `includeActions`                    |

### Example API Response

An example of the API response can be found [here](https://github.com/microsoft/terraform-provider-power-platform/blob/main/internal/services/copilot_studio_application_insights/tests/Validate_Create/app_insights.json).
